title: Unable to Reconnect after 2 hours
body: So a couple of hours ago i disconnected from a game and when i tried to reconnect it said i was unable to connect to the servers, i restarted my router thinking this would fix the problem but it didn't. I also tried to uninstall the client and re-install it. This too did nothing, so now every time i log in it says that the game is still in progress (which i know it isn't because the game was two hours ago) and it won't let me do anything. Can anyone help?

replies.body: Ahhhh this sounds like a classic ghost game. They don't happen too often and are caused when the game ends but the server never received the end of game notification. Once it's been a solid 2 hours since the game ended you'll be able to queue back up. If it's already been over 2 hours, try giving your pc a quick restart and let me know if you still can't queue up.

I've just restarted my computer (its been about 2 hours and 30 mins) and the same still happens when I start up my client, it goes right into the game and never loads and I still get stuck on the reconnect screen.
im still having the same issue. restarted my pc and everything. Still stuck on reconnect
